Thanks to Secretlab for being the title sponsor of LMG Clips this year! Check out their ergonomic gaming chairs at the link above. Your back will thank you!

Check out Dell laptops at: https://lmg.gg/dellprowanclips

Twitch has started enforcing long-standing simulcasting rules, and it might finally force the WAN Show to read Twitch chat again (just kidding). Linus and Luke dig into what’s changed, why Twitch used to have a special deal with LMG, and how the platform’s vibe has shifted over the years.

Watch the full WAN Show: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RT1t1JlZugM

title: Twitch Might Ban Us
